title: Drawing, Design for Writing Table with Massive Reeded Legs, 1900–05
title_raw: Design for Writing Table with Massive Reeded Legs
medium: Graphite on thin cream tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, bottom center: Writing Table of Mahogany / Inch Scale
creditline: Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society
description: Rectangular table top raised on 4 legs, front 2 legs are massive, reeded, and straight and have carved ornamental vase at tops; center: horizontal blind drawer flanked by 4 short drawers with C-shaped single handles at centers, set of drawers supported by small triangular spandrels; top has open central compartment with 6 small compartments at top flanked by 2 doors.

participants.person_name: The Lake St. Louis Historical Society

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Design for Writing Table with Massive Reeded Legs, 1900–05. Graphite on thin cream tracing paper. 
Gift of The Lake St. Louis Historical Society. 2000-69-241
